title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: October 23, 2022, 03:55:43 PMLast edit: May 15, 2023, 03:38:34 PM by cygan
content: on behalf of batesresearch and also to be of some help to him, i have now created this auction.here 4 Polymerbit notes in the satoshi's place manchester edition are offered in 4 separate lots (notes are not funded)as you can see on the pictures these 4 notes are in perfect condition and can be loaded with the already preprinted amount of 0.001BTCLot 1: Polymerbit 'Satoshi`s Place Manchester Edition' Note (Serial: ES001)Lot 2: Polymerbit 'Satoshi`s Place Manchester Edition' Note (Serial: ES003)Lot 3: Polymerbit 'Satoshi`s Place Manchester Edition' Note (Serial: ES004)Lot 4: Polymerbit 'Satoshi`s Place Manchester Edition' Note (Serial: ES006)    i would like to point out to all participants that i only create this auction thread here and manage the actual procedure of this auction.batesresearch is the one who owns the 4 notes and will do the whole processing (payment/shipping) with the winner after the auction ends.Auction Terms:Bid Format:  Bids only in BTCStarting Bid: lot 1: 0.006BTC - lot 2: 0.006BTC - lot 3: 0.006BTC - lot 4: 0.006BTC                             Bid Incremeents:  0.0005BTCSnipe:  each bid for each lot in the final 5 minutes adds 5 minutes until no bid has been made for 5 minutesAuction Ends:  Monday, 31 October 2022 @ 8PM (London time)Shipping costs are paid by the winner (UK shipping is free)Payment address will be supplied to the winner via PM.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Why not 4 separate lots as there was interest from many parties??This lot limits it to one winner

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on October 23, 2022, 04:20:35 PMWhy not 4 separate lots as there was interest from many parties??This lot limits it to one winner you are right and with the agreement of batesresearch 4 lots with one note each are now offered
